page.title: 03CLINICS,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: {Cofton Clinic} This post_natal clinic opens once a month from 14.00 to 16.00h. The babies are taken for injections such as Polio and German measles. Three people work at the clinic: health visitor,doctor and a state registered nurse. On average 15 people attend. The mothers and children can mix with their own age-group. Many people have changed to the newer Catshill Clinic. {Opinions We asked a few mothers what they thought of the clinic and what could be improved. The mothers agreed that they would like the clinic more often, also they would like their family doctors to be involved in the clinic.
